chapter.text: You walk over to the far wall, swerving between chairs along the way. ^1500a tall shelf stands against the wall with shelves labeled with the names of instruments. ^1500You stand in front of the wall, scanning each cubicle. ^1500All the instruments are gone. ^1500Typically, students will bring theirs home to practice, but youâ€™ve never seen the shelves this empty before.
